backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling authorization, user profiles, and CRUD operations for surgery cases with per-user storage and timestamped sync fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to related source files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing purposes of various frontend files including hooks, utilities, components, and types.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Deployment notes explaining when and how to redeploy the frontend with fresh backend bindings.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base theme variables and light/dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/redeploy.sh: Shell script performing deterministic clean rebuild and redeploy of the frontend.
Script that fully cleans, reinstalls, regenerates bindings, and rebuilds the frontend.
frontend/scripts/verify-live-backend-bin: Guide for verifying that the deployed frontend uses fresh backend bindings and the correct canister ID.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component managing authentication, profile setup, case list, case form modal, search, and sorting.
frontend/src/components/cases/CameraCapt: Empty or placeholder file for a camera capture component.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseCard.t: Displays a surgery case card with demographics, arrival data, complaint, and editable task checklist, syncing updates locally and to the server.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseForm.t: Provides a form for creating or editing cases with prefill logic, demographics extraction, validation, and task checklist setup.
frontend/src/components/cases/CaseList.t: Lists cases with search, sort, and connection-aware empty states, rendering CaseCard entries and handling loading states.
A date input with a calendar popover that validates and formats YYYY-MM-DD strings.
frontend/src/components/cases/Demographi: Textarea that extracts and returns demographics data from pasted text to auto-fill form fields.
frontend/src/components/cases/EmptyCases: Shows empty-state UI with optional migration guidance based on authentication and backend connectivity.
frontend/src/components/cases/SortContro: Controls for selecting sort field and toggling sort direction for case lists.
frontend/src/components/cases/TasksCheck: Renders and manages required task checkboxes, normalizing the checklist and emitting updates on toggle.
frontend/src/components/csv/CsvExportBut: Exports all cases to a CSV file and triggers a download with basic error handling and toasts.
frontend/src/components/errors/ModalErro: Error boundary for modal content that logs errors and displays a fallback alert with a close option.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying current year and a link to caffeine.ai with branding.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Header with app branding and login/logout handling using Internet Identity and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/startup/StartupR: Startup error screen explaining connection issues with retry and reload actions.
frontend/src/components/sync/SyncStatusB: Status bar showing online state, backend connection, sync actions, and related errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wrapper around useActor that tracks initialization failures and provides retry logic.
Manages backend connectivity by combining identity, actor readiness, and a probe query, exposing overall connection status and retry handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useCasesStore.ts: Maintains merged local and server surgery cases with add, update, delete, and import mutations using React Query and local storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnvironmentLabel.t: Returns 'Draft' or 'Live' environment label based on hostname heuristics.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities and exposing login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status via window events.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles and surgery cases through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSync.ts: Synchronizes local pending surgery cases with the backend and merges updated server state back into local storage.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/types/cases.ts: Defines LocalSurgeryCase with local-only fields and form data shape for case input, re-exporting backend task and demographics types.
Classifies backend errors into categories and user-facing messages, with helpers for actor initialization errors.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Converts LocalSurgeryCase objects to CSV and parses CSV files into rows with validation and task column handling.
frontend/src/utils/dates.ts: Provides timezone-safe date-only validation, formatting, and conversion utilities including nanosecond conversions.
frontend/src/utils/demographicsExtract.t: Extracts patient demographics from raw text using regex and keyword matching to populate structured fields.
frontend/src/utils/draftAdminToken.ts: Retrieves and checks the presence of a draft admin token from URL or session storage.
frontend/src/utils/localPersistence.ts: Loads, normalizes, saves, and clears LocalSurgeryCase data in localStorage with BigInt-safe serialization.
frontend/src/utils/mergeCases.ts: Merges local and server surgery cases preserving local-only fields and prepares cases for sync by applying local pending changes.
frontend/src/utils/prefill.ts: Provides utilities to find the most recent case by MRN and extract demographics for form prefilling.
frontend/src/utils/tasksChecklist.ts: Defines task metadata and functions to create, normalize, and manage task checklists for cases.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, and feature definitions for the Surgery Case Tracker.
